Package oop.gruppe4.robocode.robot

Class RobotStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop.gruppe4.robocode.robot.RobotStatistics
  • public class RobotStatistics
extends Object
    RobotStatistics keeps track of a robots previous Transforms.
    Author:
    Ask Hetland Berentsen.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  RobotStatistics.Statistic
      Statistics of a robot.
      static class  RobotStatistics.Status
      The status of a Robot.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(@NotNull
                @NotNull RobotStatistics.Statistic stat)
        Adds a Transform to the history. If the amount of entries exceeds that of the capacity, the first entry is removed.
        Parameters:
        stat - a Transform.

      • setReason

        public void setReason​(String reason)
        Sets the reason for being targeted.
        Parameters:
        reason - a String.

        Returns:

      • getStatus

        public RobotStatistics.Status getStatus()
        Gets the status.
        Returns:
        the status.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Checks if this is active.
        Returns:
        true if the status is set to RobotStatistics.Status.ACTIVE. false otherwise.

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        Checks if this is alive.
        Returns:
        true if the status is set to RobotStatistics.Status.ACTIVE or RobotStatistics.Status.UNKNOWN. false otherwise.

      • isReitred

        public boolean isReitred()
        Checks if this is alive.
        Returns:
        true if the status is set to RobotStatistics.Status.RETIRED. false otherwise.

        Gets the aggression level.
        Returns:
        the aggression level.

        Adds an amount to the aggression level.
        Parameters:
        amount - an amount to increase with.

        public void predict()

      • getLast

        public RobotStatistics.Statistic getLast()
        Gets the last entry in the history.
        Returns:
        the last Transform in the history.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if history is empty.
        See Also:
        history

      • getDelta

        public RobotStatistics.Statistic getDelta()
        Calculates the difference between the last and the next to last Transform in the history.
        Returns:
        the delta of two Transforms.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if history is empty.
        See Also:
        history

      • getPrevious

        public RobotStatistics.Statistic getPrevious()

      • get

        public RobotStatistics.Statistic get​(int index)
        Gets a specific entry in the history.
        Parameters:
        index - the index to fetch from.
        Returns:
        a Statistic.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= history.size())
        See Also:
        history
